tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Paul and Dr Rita are very kind with their patients and show their good expertise while giving treatment for all patients with high patience 😊👌👌😊  I, Nirmala Desigan would personally like to thank both doctors and the nurse (sister) for making me comfortable and feel painless while extracting my Molar teeth (cavity teeth) with high patience. 🙏🙏🙏💐👍👍👍💐🤗🤗🤗  I believe that Dr Rita and Dr Paul are one of the best Doctors' in Kottivakkam/ Thiruvanmiyur area.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Hi All, I actually fixed an appointment with another doctor, But  no response for my calls, Though I have tried to fix the date for a long time, They were kind of lethargic and not much attentive for my calls & queries, Always seems to be busy, So i searched practo and found out this doctor suggestion on first sight itself, Immediately i called as i was suffering with little pain, Doctor was very professional and at the same time, I could feel that care in his response, Immediately follow up fixed, i got a reminder call & message then & there, No long wait time, Staffs were very friendly, Especially Doctor Geetha, She understood my concern completely, Helped me a lot, Doctor Corlson, Actually i have to write pages about this service, such a nice doctor, He is kind enough to understand our problem, He would explain in detail about the options and the issues, we can select whichever  is comfortable for us, Completely service minded, I thoroughly statisfied with his service and i would recommend him for all your dental issues, Last but not least cost effective. Thank you so much doctor.
reply_text: Thank you mam! Pleasure treating you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Titus.... Currently, taking treatment for my daughter's Teeth Straightening. Almost 3 months over since the 1st consultation started! Everything was smooth... be it appointment, procedure, explanation, follow-ups, waiting @ clinic.... 

a) Being taken care well by Dr. Titus in treatment / queries / explanation by keeping patient comfy
b) Same way, on fixing appointments / follow-ups / enquiring daughter about post treatment effect every months by Ms. Rita. 

It has been going good and results are progressing well. Counting on remaining sittings and confident on final outcome of teeth alignment as expected with SMILE - trademark of Dr. Titus & his team!
reply_text: Thank you :) Happy treating your family :)
